channel.title: Layouts on Hugo Theme Bootstrap Docs v1
channel.description: Recent content in Layouts on Hugo Theme Bootstrap Docs v1

item.title: Landing Page Layout
item.description: In this article, we’ll talk about the landing page layout, you may be interested in it if you’re going to customizing the pages in Markdown way.

item.title: Docs Layout
item.description: In this article, we’ll explore the docs layout, which can be used to write project documentation, personal notes, and more.

item.title: FAQ Layout
item.description: The FAQ page is a collection of frequently asked questions.

item.title: Archive Layout
item.description: The archive page is a collection of posts grouped by year.

item.title: Search Layout
item.description: It may be difficult for readers to retrieve an article in the case if there are many articles in your site, therefore, we added the search feature.

item.title: Contact Form
item.description: We can put our email address on social links so that readers can contact us. Unfortunately, emails will be more or less treated as spam and even filtered. Therefore, we bring a feature called contact form.
